title: Repeated grievance escalation toward executive
content: Third warning this week. The CEO will be at town hall and everyone will see what happens. We know the route and schedule.

title: Recon chatter about HQ access points
content: Security at the HQ side entrance is light after 7pm. Badge process is predictable. Could stage on the west side.

title: Insider grievance post with targeting language
content: After termination I am done staying quiet. Leadership should pay and everyone at HQ should hear it in person.
